solution_line_template: Thrice the number of chocolate squares that Mike ate is {mike_ate} squares * {multiplier_thrice} = <<{mike_ate}*{multiplier_thrice}={thrice_mike_ate}>>{thrice_mike_ate} squares.
Jenny therefore ate {thrice_mike_ate} squares + {more_than_thrice} squares = <<{thrice_mike_ate}+{more_than_thrice}={jenny_ate}>>{jenny_ate} chocolate squares
